channel.title: Jarring problem
channel.description:
Hello,I am currently Jarring my RSPS.But it wont open afther Jarring. It says " Error : Could not find or load main class client ..."
Have followed tutorials,and did Manifest Template,and main class to client.
Any help?
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/k9erm.png[/img]

item.title: Jarring problem
item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

[quote=“Ries, post:8, topic:524025”][quote author=voetbal645 link=topic=642567.msg4327566#msg4327566 date=1373195717]

is your client packaged in 2 folders like src and bin or something like that?
or class files and java files.

Src & bin & Lib . 3 folders

thats what the problem is, if your jarring your client you need the class and java files in one file and the sign folder apart.
So you open your client folder and there are the run.bat, compiler.bat, Sign folder and just the class and java files.
I guess you need to edit your compiler.bat to for compiling it.
And if u jar your client then it will work.
[/quote]

Should U can help me with it?

Skype : proxz95[/quote]
Added, will post the fix after.

EDIT:
Fixed it, so the problem was like i said before.
The class and java files together with the compiler and run in one file.
And it was a 667+ client so the manifest need to be Loader not client.

Read full topic

[/quote]
thats what the problem is, if your jarring your client you need the class and java files in one file and the sign folder apart.
So you open your client folder and there are the run.bat, compiler.bat, Sign folder and just the class and java files.
I guess you need to edit your compiler.bat to for compiling it.

item.title: Jarring problem

is your client packaged in 2 folders like src and bin or something like that?
or class files and java files.
[/quote]

Src & bin & Lib . 3 folders[/quote]
thats what the problem is, if your jarring your client you need the class and java files in one file and the sign folder apart.
So you open your client folder and there are the run.bat, compiler.bat, Sign folder and just the class and java files.
I guess you need to edit your compiler.bat to for compiling it.
And if u jar your client then it will work.
